title: DIY Art Deco font
content:
Hi,

I have been looking for a book which shows the set-up of at least one Art Deco font, so I can draw it by hand.

Does anybody have suggestions?  
If anybody has a suggestion about a book with the set up of another type of font, that would be great too.

Thanks,  
Anabel.
author: anabelvlaminck

comments.content:
You can browse the books of [Steve Heller](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106082528/http:/www.hellerbooks.com/). I’ve got [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106082528/http:/www.amazon.com/Deco-Type-Stylish-Alphabets-Design/dp/0811811352/sr=1-1/qid=1160756977/ref=sr_1_1/002-1170108-4048008?ie=UTF8&s=books).  
Best, v
